pr_title: Cb-7808 Flow events are missing from Structuctured events

timeline.author: doktoric

timeline.message:
Cb-7808 Flow events are missing from Structuctured events
We filtered the structured events to datalake and datahub only but before 2.25 the CB stored as stacks. The legacy resource type added

timeline.bodyText: I don't see any tests which ensure that events are not broken again.
timeline.author: akanto

replies.bodyText:
I think we don't have any tests what can catch this. Here is the use case:
Start a distrox with 2.24
Update Cb to 2.25
Before the fix, the resource type with stacks was filtered out.
If you want I can write a UT, but I think this test will not prevent similar cases.
